title: A functional connectivity approach for exploring interactions of multiple ecosystem services in the context of agricultural landscapes in the Canadian prairies
content:
Publication date: August 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 68

Author(s): Ehsan Pashanejad, Ali Kharrazi, Zuelclady M.F. Araujo-Gutierrez, Brian E. Robinson, Brian D. Fath, Lael Parrott
